summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Community Development Block Grant Float Loan Program; authorizing a short-term loan of up to Six Million Dollars ($6,000,000) in Block Grant funds to a partnership formed by Low Income Housing Institute, a Washington non-profit corporation, for a community development project involving the rehabilitation of the Frye Building, an historic structure which houses low-income residential tenants; and authorizing amendment of the City's Consolidated Plan.
